All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alarm
Class for the Alarms
AudioManager
AudioManager class for managing audio playback.
Bomb
Class to manage class Bomb
Bomb.BombState
The various states of bomb
BombManager
Class to manage the class bomb
BrightHead
Class for BrightHead enemy
Collider
Class to create the Collider
CollisionChecker
Class CollisionChecker to check if two entity/Collider make contact
EnemiesManager
Class to manage the enemies
Entity
Class to manage the generic type of Entity
FlyHead
Class to manage the FlyHead enemy
GameManager
Class GameManger that manages the game status and its saves
GamePanel
GamePanel class that handles the game loop, player input, and rendering.
HUD
The HUD (Heads-Up Display) class manages the graphical elements displayed on the screen during gameplay and game over state.
JBomberMan
Class JBomberMan, the main class of game
KeyHandler
Class KeyHandler that implements KeyListener and handles keyboard input for the game It tracks the state of specific keys (W, S, A, D)
ManageFile
Class ManageFile to manage the file with data of player
ObjectManager
The ObjectManager class is responsible for managing various objects on the game map
ObjectManager.PowerUpType
Different types of power-ups
Player
Class Player that contains fields for handling animation frames, storing sprite images for different directions, and references to the game panel and key handler for input processing.
PowerUp
The PowerUp class represents a power-up entity in the game
Sprite
Class Sprite to manage the sprite object
Title
Class Title that represents a map title with properties such as position, size, collision status, and sprite It is used to define tiles on the game map
TitleManager
Class TitleManager manages the game map and titles.
TitleManager.TitleType
The different type of title
User
Class for User Model
UserController
Class for UserController
UserView
Class for UserView
Vector2
Class to manage double object
Window
Class Window that extends JFrame and represents the main window of the game
